abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan supports the
            Government's program of structural adjustment.  It aims
            to enhance the actions taken under the first three SALs by
            further improving overall fiscal performance.  More
            particularly the proposed operation assists the Government
            in addressing:  (1) monitoring and control of public
            enterprises; (2) improved operating balances of public
            enterprises targeted; (3) elimination of intergovernmental
            arrears, and (4) a reduction in the size and scope of the
            public sector.  The loan finances imports of raw materials,
            intermediate goods, non-luxury consumer goods, capital
            equipment and spare parts.
